00019 b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::b3GpuParallelLinearBvh(cl_context context, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue) :
00020         m_queue(queue),
00021         m_radixSorter(context, device, queue),
00022         
00023         m_rootNodeIndex(context, queue),
00024         m_maxDistanceFromRoot(context, queue),
00025         m_temp(context, queue),
00026         
00027         m_internalNodeAabbs(context, queue),
00028         m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges(context, queue),
00029         m_internalNodeChildNodes(context, queue),
00030         m_internalNodeParentNodes(context, queue),
00031         
00032         m_commonPrefixes(context, queue),
00033         m_commonPrefixLengths(context, queue),
00034         m_distanceFromRoot(context, queue),
00035         
00036         m_leafNodeParentNodes(context, queue),
00037         m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies(context, queue),
00038         m_mergedAabb(context, queue),
00039         m_leafNodeAabbs(context, queue),
00040         
00041         m_largeAabbs(context, queue)
00042 {
00043         m_rootNodeIndex.resize(1);
00044         m_maxDistanceFromRoot.resize(1);
00045         m_temp.resize(1);
00046         
00047         //
00048         const char CL_PROGRAM_PATH[] = "src/Bullet3OpenCL/BroadphaseCollision/kernels/parallelLinearBvh.cl";
00049         
00050         const char* kernelSource = parallelLinearBvhCL; //parallelLinearBvhCL.h
00051         cl_int error;
00052         char* additionalMacros = 0;
00053         m_parallelLinearBvhProgram = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(context, device, kernelSource, &error, additionalMacros, CL_PROGRAM_PATH);
00054         b3Assert(m_parallelLinearBvhProgram);
00055         
00056         m_separateAabbsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "separateAabbs", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00057         b3Assert(m_separateAabbsKernel);
00058         m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "findAllNodesMergedAabb", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00059         b3Assert(m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel);
00060         m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndicies", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00061         b3Assert(m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel);
00062         
00063         m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefix", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00064         b3Assert(m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel);
00065         m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodes", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00066         b3Assert(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel);
00067         m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodes", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00068         b3Assert(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel);
00069         m_findDistanceFromRootKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "findDistanceFromRoot", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00070         b3Assert(m_findDistanceFromRootKernel);
00071         m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursive", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00072         b3Assert(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel);
00073         
00074         m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "findLeafIndexRanges", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00075         b3Assert(m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel);
00076         
00077         m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairs", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00078         b3Assert(m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel);
00079         m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "plbvhRayTraverse", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00080         b3Assert(m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel);
00081         m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "plbvhLargeAabbAabbTest", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00082         b3Assert(m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel);
00083         m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString( context, device, kernelSource, "plbvhLargeAabbRayTest", &error, m_parallelLinearBvhProgram, additionalMacros );
00084         b3Assert(m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel);
00085 }
00086 
00087 b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::~b3GpuParallelLinearBvh() 
00088 {
00089         clReleaseKernel(m_separateAabbsKernel);
00090         clReleaseKernel(m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel);
00091         clReleaseKernel(m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel);
00092         
00093         clReleaseKernel(m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel);
00094         clReleaseKernel(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel);
00095         clReleaseKernel(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel);
00096         clReleaseKernel(m_findDistanceFromRootKernel);
00097         clReleaseKernel(m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel);
00098         
00099         clReleaseKernel(m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel);
00100         
00101         clReleaseKernel(m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel);
00102         clReleaseKernel(m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel);
00103         clReleaseKernel(m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel);
00104         clReleaseKernel(m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel);
00105         
00106         clReleaseProgram(m_parallelLinearBvhProgram);
00107 }
00108 
00109 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::build(const b3OpenCLArray<b3SapAabb>& worldSpaceAabbs, const b3OpenCLArray<int>& smallAabbIndices, 
00110                                                                         const b3OpenCLArray<int>& largeAabbIndices)
00111 {
00112         B3_PROFILE("b3ParallelLinearBvh::build()");
00113         
00114         int numLargeAabbs = largeAabbIndices.size();
00115         int numSmallAabbs = smallAabbIndices.size();
00116         
00117         //Since all AABBs(both large and small) are input as a contiguous array, 
00118         //with 2 additional arrays used to indicate the indices of large and small AABBs,
00119         //it is necessary to separate the AABBs so that the large AABBs will not degrade the quality of the BVH.
00120         {
00121                 B3_PROFILE("Separate large and small AABBs");
00122                 
00123                 m_largeAabbs.resize(numLargeAabbs);
00124                 m_leafNodeAabbs.resize(numSmallAabbs);
00125                 
00126                 //Write large AABBs into m_largeAabbs
00127                 {
00128                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00129                         {
00130                                 b3BufferInfoCL( worldSpaceAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00131                                 b3BufferInfoCL( largeAabbIndices.getBufferCL() ),
00132                                 
00133                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_largeAabbs.getBufferCL() )
00134                         };
00135                         
00136                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_separateAabbsKernel, "m_separateAabbsKernel");
00137                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00138                         launcher.setConst(numLargeAabbs);
00139                         
00140                         launcher.launch1D(numLargeAabbs);
00141                 }
00142                 
00143                 //Write small AABBs into m_leafNodeAabbs
00144                 {
00145                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00146                         {
00147                                 b3BufferInfoCL( worldSpaceAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00148                                 b3BufferInfoCL( smallAabbIndices.getBufferCL() ),
00149                                 
00150                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() )
00151                         };
00152                         
00153                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_separateAabbsKernel, "m_separateAabbsKernel");
00154                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00155                         launcher.setConst(numSmallAabbs);
00156                         
00157                         launcher.launch1D(numSmallAabbs);
00158                 }
00159                 
00160                 clFinish(m_queue);
00161         }
00162         
00163         //
00164         int numLeaves = numSmallAabbs;  //Number of leaves in the BVH == Number of rigid bodies with small AABBs
00165         int numInternalNodes = numLeaves - 1;
00166         
00167         if(numLeaves < 2)
00168         {
00169                 //Number of leaf nodes is checked in calculateOverlappingPairs() and testRaysAgainstBvhAabbs(),
00170                 //so it does not matter if numLeaves == 0 and rootNodeIndex == -1
00171                 int rootNodeIndex = numLeaves - 1;
00172                 m_rootNodeIndex.copyFromHostPointer(&rootNodeIndex, 1);
00173                 
00174                 //Since the AABBs need to be rearranged(sorted) for the BVH construction algorithm,
00175                 //m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.m_value is used to map a sorted AABB index to the unsorted AABB index
00176                 //instead of directly moving the AABBs. It needs to be set for the ray cast traversal kernel to work.
00177                 //( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies[].m_value == unsorted index == index of m_leafNodeAabbs )
00178                 if(numLeaves == 1)
00179                 {
00180                         b3SortData leaf;
00181                         leaf.m_value = 0;               //1 leaf so index is always 0; leaf.m_key does not need to be set
00182                         
00183                         m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.resize(1);
00184                         m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.copyFromHostPointer(&leaf, 1);
00185                 }
00186                 
00187                 return;
00188         }
00189         
00190         //
00191         {
00192                 m_internalNodeAabbs.resize(numInternalNodes);
00193                 m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges.resize(numInternalNodes);
00194                 m_internalNodeChildNodes.resize(numInternalNodes);
00195                 m_internalNodeParentNodes.resize(numInternalNodes);
00196 
00197                 m_commonPrefixes.resize(numInternalNodes);
00198                 m_commonPrefixLengths.resize(numInternalNodes);
00199                 m_distanceFromRoot.resize(numInternalNodes);
00200         
00201                 m_leafNodeParentNodes.resize(numLeaves);
00202                 m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.resize(numLeaves);
00203                 m_mergedAabb.resize(numLeaves);
00204         }
00205         
00206         //Find the merged AABB of all small AABBs; this is used to define the size of 
00207         //each cell in the virtual grid for the next kernel(2^10 cells in each dimension).
00208         {
00209                 B3_PROFILE("Find AABB of merged nodes");
00210         
00211                 m_mergedAabb.copyFromOpenCLArray(m_leafNodeAabbs);      //Need to make a copy since the kernel modifies the array
00212                         
00213                 for(int numAabbsNeedingMerge = numLeaves; numAabbsNeedingMerge >= 2; 
00214                                 numAabbsNeedingMerge = numAabbsNeedingMerge / 2 + numAabbsNeedingMerge % 2)
00215                 {
00216                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00217                         {
00218                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_mergedAabb.getBufferCL() )            //Resulting AABB is stored in m_mergedAabb[0]
00219                         };
00220                         
00221                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel, "m_findAllNodesMergedAabbKernel");
00222                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00223                         launcher.setConst(numAabbsNeedingMerge);
00224                         
00225                         launcher.launch1D(numAabbsNeedingMerge);
00226                 }
00227                 
00228                 clFinish(m_queue);
00229         }
00230         
00231         //Insert the center of the AABBs into a virtual grid,
00232         //then convert the discrete grid coordinates into a morton code
00233         //For each element in m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies, set
00234         //      m_key == morton code (value to sort by)
00235         //      m_value == small AABB index
00236         {
00237                 B3_PROFILE("Assign morton codes");
00238         
00239                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00240                 {
00241                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00242                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_mergedAabb.getBufferCL() ),
00243                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.getBufferCL() )
00244                 };
00245                 
00246                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel, "m_assignMortonCodesAndAabbIndiciesKernel");
00247                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00248                 launcher.setConst(numLeaves);
00249                 
00250                 launcher.launch1D(numLeaves);
00251                 clFinish(m_queue);
00252         }
00253         
00254         //
00255         {
00256                 B3_PROFILE("Sort leaves by morton codes");
00257         
00258                 m_radixSorter.execute(m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies);
00259                 clFinish(m_queue);
00260         }
00261         
00262         //
00263         constructBinaryRadixTree();
00264         
00265         
00266         //Since it is a sorted binary radix tree, each internal node contains a contiguous subset of leaf node indices.
00267         //The root node contains leaf node indices in the range [0, numLeafNodes - 1].
00268         //The child nodes of each node split their parent's index range into 2 contiguous halves.
00269         //
00270         //For example, if the root has indices [0, 31], its children might partition that range into [0, 11] and [12, 31].
00271         //The next level in the tree could then split those ranges into [0, 2], [3, 11], [12, 22], and [23, 31].
00272         //
00273         //This property can be used for optimizing calculateOverlappingPairs(), to avoid testing each AABB pair twice
00274         {
00275                 B3_PROFILE("m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel");
00276         
00277                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00278                 {
00279                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00280                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges.getBufferCL() )
00281                 };
00282                 
00283                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel, "m_findLeafIndexRangesKernel");
00284                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00285                 launcher.setConst(numInternalNodes);
00286                 
00287                 launcher.launch1D(numInternalNodes);
00288                 clFinish(m_queue);
00289         }
00290 }
00291 
00292 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::calculateOverlappingPairs(b3OpenCLArray<b3Int4>& out_overlappingPairs)
00293 {
00294         int maxPairs = out_overlappingPairs.size();
00295         b3OpenCLArray<int>& numPairsGpu = m_temp;
00296         
00297         int reset = 0;
00298         numPairsGpu.copyFromHostPointer(&reset, 1);
00299         
00300         //
00301         if( m_leafNodeAabbs.size() > 1 )
00302         {
00303                 B3_PROFILE("PLBVH small-small AABB test");
00304         
00305                 int numQueryAabbs = m_leafNodeAabbs.size();
00306                 
00307                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00308                 {
00309                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00310                         
00311                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_rootNodeIndex.getBufferCL() ),
00312                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00313                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00314                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges.getBufferCL() ),
00315                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.getBufferCL() ),
00316                         
00317                         b3BufferInfoCL( numPairsGpu.getBufferCL() ),
00318                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_overlappingPairs.getBufferCL() )
00319                 };
00320                 
00321                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel, "m_plbvhCalculateOverlappingPairsKernel");
00322                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00323                 launcher.setConst(maxPairs);
00324                 launcher.setConst(numQueryAabbs);
00325                 
00326                 launcher.launch1D(numQueryAabbs);
00327                 clFinish(m_queue);
00328         }
00329         
00330         int numLargeAabbRigids = m_largeAabbs.size();
00331         if( numLargeAabbRigids > 0 && m_leafNodeAabbs.size() > 0 )
00332         {
00333                 B3_PROFILE("PLBVH large-small AABB test");
00334         
00335                 int numQueryAabbs = m_leafNodeAabbs.size();
00336                 
00337                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00338                 {
00339                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00340                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_largeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00341                         
00342                         b3BufferInfoCL( numPairsGpu.getBufferCL() ),
00343                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_overlappingPairs.getBufferCL() )
00344                 };
00345                 
00346                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel, "m_plbvhLargeAabbAabbTestKernel");
00347                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00348                 launcher.setConst(maxPairs);
00349                 launcher.setConst(numLargeAabbRigids);
00350                 launcher.setConst(numQueryAabbs);
00351                 
00352                 launcher.launch1D(numQueryAabbs);
00353                 clFinish(m_queue);
00354         }
00355         
00356         
00357         //
00358         int numPairs = -1;
00359         numPairsGpu.copyToHostPointer(&numPairs, 1);
00360         if(numPairs > maxPairs)
00361         {
00362                 b3Error("Error running out of pairs: numPairs = %d, maxPairs = %d.\n", numPairs, maxPairs);
00363                 numPairs = maxPairs;
00364                 numPairsGpu.copyFromHostPointer(&maxPairs, 1);
00365         }
00366         
00367         out_overlappingPairs.resize(numPairs);
00368 }
00369 
00370 
00371 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::testRaysAgainstBvhAabbs(const b3OpenCLArray<b3RayInfo>& rays, 
00372                                                         b3OpenCLArray<int>& out_numRayRigidPairs, b3OpenCLArray<b3Int2>& out_rayRigidPairs)
00373 {
00374         B3_PROFILE("PLBVH testRaysAgainstBvhAabbs()");
00375         
00376         int numRays = rays.size();
00377         int maxRayRigidPairs = out_rayRigidPairs.size();
00378         
00379         int reset = 0;
00380         out_numRayRigidPairs.copyFromHostPointer(&reset, 1);
00381         
00382         //
00383         if( m_leafNodeAabbs.size() > 0 )
00384         {
00385                 B3_PROFILE("PLBVH ray test small AABB");
00386         
00387                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00388                 {
00389                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00390                         
00391                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_rootNodeIndex.getBufferCL() ),
00392                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00393                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00394                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeLeafIndexRanges.getBufferCL() ),
00395                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.getBufferCL() ),
00396                         
00397                         b3BufferInfoCL( rays.getBufferCL() ),
00398                         
00399                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_numRayRigidPairs.getBufferCL() ),
00400                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_rayRigidPairs.getBufferCL() )
00401                 };
00402                 
00403                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel, "m_plbvhRayTraverseKernel");
00404                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00405                 launcher.setConst(maxRayRigidPairs);
00406                 launcher.setConst(numRays);
00407                 
00408                 launcher.launch1D(numRays);
00409                 clFinish(m_queue);
00410         }
00411         
00412         int numLargeAabbRigids = m_largeAabbs.size();
00413         if(numLargeAabbRigids > 0)
00414         {
00415                 B3_PROFILE("PLBVH ray test large AABB");
00416                 
00417                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00418                 {
00419                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_largeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00420                         b3BufferInfoCL( rays.getBufferCL() ),
00421                         
00422                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_numRayRigidPairs.getBufferCL() ),
00423                         b3BufferInfoCL( out_rayRigidPairs.getBufferCL() )
00424                 };
00425                 
00426                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel, "m_plbvhLargeAabbRayTestKernel");
00427                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00428                 launcher.setConst(numLargeAabbRigids);
00429                 launcher.setConst(maxRayRigidPairs);
00430                 launcher.setConst(numRays);
00431                 
00432                 launcher.launch1D(numRays);
00433                 clFinish(m_queue);
00434         }
00435         
00436         //
00437         int numRayRigidPairs = -1;
00438         out_numRayRigidPairs.copyToHostPointer(&numRayRigidPairs, 1);
00439         
00440         if(numRayRigidPairs > maxRayRigidPairs)
00441                 b3Error("Error running out of rayRigid pairs: numRayRigidPairs = %d, maxRayRigidPairs = %d.\n", numRayRigidPairs, maxRayRigidPairs);
00442         
00443 }
00444 
00445 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::constructBinaryRadixTree()
00446 {
00447         B3_PROFILE("b3GpuParallelLinearBvh::constructBinaryRadixTree()");
00448         
00449         int numLeaves = m_leafNodeAabbs.size();
00450         int numInternalNodes = numLeaves - 1;
00451         
00452         //Each internal node is placed in between 2 leaf nodes.
00453         //By using this arrangement and computing the common prefix between
00454         //these 2 adjacent leaf nodes, it is possible to quickly construct a binary radix tree.
00455         {
00456                 B3_PROFILE("m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel");
00457                 
00458                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00459                 {
00460                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.getBufferCL() ),
00461                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_commonPrefixes.getBufferCL() ),
00462                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_commonPrefixLengths.getBufferCL() )
00463                 };
00464                 
00465                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel, "m_computeAdjacentPairCommonPrefixKernel");
00466                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00467                 launcher.setConst(numInternalNodes);
00468                 
00469                 launcher.launch1D(numInternalNodes);
00470                 clFinish(m_queue);
00471         }
00472         
00473         //For each leaf node, select its parent node by 
00474         //comparing the 2 nearest internal nodes and assign child node indices
00475         {
00476                 B3_PROFILE("m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel");
00477                 
00478                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00479                 {
00480                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_commonPrefixLengths.getBufferCL() ),
00481                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeParentNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00482                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() )
00483                 };
00484                 
00485                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel, "m_buildBinaryRadixTreeLeafNodesKernel");
00486                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00487                 launcher.setConst(numLeaves);
00488                 
00489                 launcher.launch1D(numLeaves);
00490                 clFinish(m_queue);
00491         }
00492         
00493         //For each internal node, perform 2 binary searches among the other internal nodes
00494         //to its left and right to find its potential parent nodes and assign child node indices
00495         {
00496                 B3_PROFILE("m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel");
00497                 
00498                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00499                 {
00500                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_commonPrefixes.getBufferCL() ),
00501                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_commonPrefixLengths.getBufferCL() ),
00502                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00503                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeParentNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00504                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_rootNodeIndex.getBufferCL() )
00505                 };
00506                 
00507                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel, "m_buildBinaryRadixTreeInternalNodesKernel");
00508                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00509                 launcher.setConst(numInternalNodes);
00510                 
00511                 launcher.launch1D(numInternalNodes);
00512                 clFinish(m_queue);
00513         }
00514         
00515         //Find the number of nodes seperating each internal node and the root node
00516         //so that the AABBs can be set using the next kernel.
00517         //Also determine the maximum number of nodes separating an internal node and the root node.
00518         {
00519                 B3_PROFILE("m_findDistanceFromRootKernel");
00520         
00521                 b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00522                 {
00523                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_rootNodeIndex.getBufferCL() ),
00524                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeParentNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00525                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_maxDistanceFromRoot.getBufferCL() ),
00526                         b3BufferInfoCL( m_distanceFromRoot.getBufferCL() )
00527                 };
00528                 
00529                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_findDistanceFromRootKernel, "m_findDistanceFromRootKernel");
00530                 launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00531                 launcher.setConst(numInternalNodes);
00532                 
00533                 launcher.launch1D(numInternalNodes);
00534                 clFinish(m_queue);
00535         }
00536         
00537         //Starting from the internal nodes nearest to the leaf nodes, recursively move up
00538         //the tree towards the root to set the AABBs of each internal node; each internal node
00539         //checks its children and merges their AABBs
00540         {
00541                 B3_PROFILE("m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel");
00542                 
00543                 int maxDistanceFromRoot = -1;
00544                 {
00545                         B3_PROFILE("copy maxDistanceFromRoot to CPU");
00546                         m_maxDistanceFromRoot.copyToHostPointer(&maxDistanceFromRoot, 1);
00547                         clFinish(m_queue);
00548                 }
00549                 
00550                 for(int distanceFromRoot = maxDistanceFromRoot; distanceFromRoot >= 0; --distanceFromRoot)
00551                 {
00552                         b3BufferInfoCL bufferInfo[] = 
00553                         {
00554                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_distanceFromRoot.getBufferCL() ),
00555                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_mortonCodesAndAabbIndicies.getBufferCL() ),
00556                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeChildNodes.getBufferCL() ),
00557                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_leafNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() ),
00558                                 b3BufferInfoCL( m_internalNodeAabbs.getBufferCL() )
00559                         };
00560                         
00561                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_queue, m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel, "m_buildBinaryRadixTreeAabbsRecursiveKernel");
00562                         launcher.setBuffers( bufferInfo, sizeof(bufferInfo)/sizeof(b3BufferInfoCL) );
00563                         launcher.setConst(maxDistanceFromRoot);
00564                         launcher.setConst(distanceFromRoot);
00565                         launcher.setConst(numInternalNodes);
00566                         
00567                         //It may seem inefficent to launch a thread for each internal node when a
00568                         //much smaller number of nodes is actually processed, but this is actually
00569                         //faster than determining the exact nodes that are ready to merge their child AABBs. 
00570                         launcher.launch1D(numInternalNodes);
00571                 }
00572                 
00573                 clFinish(m_queue);
00574         }
00575 }
00576 
00577
